name: 陳振誠
objective: 健康建築環境與設計方式，透過建築設計達成永續發展目標 (SDGs) 與永續報告書 (ESG) 之健康福祉。課程包含探討國際發展健康建築認證系統與項目，關鍵影響人員健康之環境因子：空氣、水、熱舒適、光、聲學、水、材料、運動、營養、心靈、互動等項目，從中探討健康建築與人之健康關連，並具體呈現於設計規範策略，作為深度研究議題，滿足學生學習核心能力。
schedule:
1.  課程介紹  Course introduction.
2. 空氣品質與健康環境  Air Quality and Healthy environment - outdoor air quality, indoor air quality.
3.  空氣污染與防疫 Air Pollution-Smoke Free Environment, Construction Pollution Management.
4. 建築材料與家具 01  Building Materials and Furniture 01- Material Restrictions
5.  建築材料與家具 02 Building Materials and Furniture  02- Interior Hazardous Materials Management
6.  家具安全與健康管理 Furniture-safe and healthy Management
7.  通風設計 Ventilation Design- Enhanced Air Quality and energy saving.
8.  空氣品質監控與智慧物聯網 Air Quality Monitoring and Awareness-Intelligent device, Sensor with edge computing
9.	期中報告 Mid-term week： Mid-term report
10.  溫熱舒適環境 01 Thermal Comfort  01- Thermal Performance and comfort.
11.  溫熱舒適環境 02 Thermal Comfort 02- Thermal zone, Humidity Control.
12.  光環境 Light Quality- Light Exposure, Visual Lighting Design, Daylight Design Strategies.
13.  水品質 Water Quality- Water Quality Indicators, Drinking Water Quality, Water Management.
14. 聲學舒適環境  Acoustic comfort- Sound and Noise, Sound Mapping, Noise Levels, Reverberation Time, Sound Reducing Surfaces.
15. 營養 Nourishment- Food environment and health Diets.
16.  身心靈健康 Mental Health- Mental Health Services and design.
17.  社區互動 Community- Communication and CO-Share space
18.	期末報告 Final week： Final report
scorePolicy:
1.	出席率 Attendance：Absent for three or more lessons will fail the course.
2.	報告 Participation：Every student needs to prepare brief reports to lessons.
3.     出席率 Attendance 30%
        期中報告 Mid-term report 35%
        期末報告 Final report 35%
